suggest.spryker-shop/customer-page: if you want to use customer layout templates: ^1.0.0
suggest.spryker-shop/shared-cart-widget: If you want to use CartListPermissionGroupWidget or CartListPermissionGroupWidgetPlugin
suggest.spryker-shop/shopping-list-widget: If you want to use components from module ShoppingListWidget or CartToShoppingListWidgetPlugin
suggest.spryker/permission: If you want to use permissions plugins
suggest.spryker/silex: Use this module when using plugins that need Silex dependencies.
